reviews.text:
What a restaurant should be. Good food, prepared properly, served with pride, in an exceptional environment (their patio). 

Lindey's never fails.
This is the cutest patio in Columbus hands down, the vibes make you feel like you're in the European countryside. The food was pretty good but I wasn't...
This is my favorite restaurant, but I'm only now coming to write a review because I just recently came in for restaurant week. Going to Lindy's over the...
